name: Tower Defence (Leadshot, Cosmiii)
description:
Controls
A keyboard and mouse is required to play this game. 
Defend the planets from invading  ships  that are trying to attack you. Build towers to destroy the ships to defend the planets.

You can move the camera by pressing W,A,S,D or using the mouse curser and putting it to any of the sides in the game (curser on top moves you forwards, left side moves you left etc)

Each tower costs 150 money.
The towers are the big images near the bottom of the screen and can be placed on any planet.

You can track how many planets are left and how much money you have on the top left of the screen. 

1.  A standard tower that does some damage
2. A tower that deals no tower but slows enemies
3. A fast shooting tower

Team members:

Matthew Payne 
Kobi Mcleod 
Connor Smith 

Huge thank you for Graphic Designer  Ellivia  Silcock for our icon and our title screen
